21-002CH.summary: Recommendation to receive and file Cultural Heritage Commission meeting minutes of November 24, 2020.Page 1 of 5HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 5:00 PMTUESDAY, FEBRUARY 23, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHCULTURAL HERITAGE COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Ramos, seconded by Vice Chair Irvine, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 5 - Tasha Hunter, Kevin McGuan, Lourdes Ramos, Kathleen Irvine and Julianna RooseveltAbstain: 1 - Mark GrisafeAbsent: 1 - Mary HindsDIRECTOR'S REPORTPatricia Diefenderfer, Planning Bureau Manager, spoke.Commissioner Grisafe spoke.SWEARING OF WITNESSESREGULAR AGENDA1.

21-003CH.summary: Recommendation to approve a Certificate of Appropriateness to paint two murals and change building façade paint colors on elevations of an existing commercial building located at 2800 East 4th Street. The property is developed with a noncontributing structure located in the Bluff Heights Historic District. (District 2) Patricia Diefenderfer, Planning Bureau Manager, introduced Maryanne Cronin, Project Planner, who presented the staff report.Chair Roosevelt spoke.Michael Forrest, applicant, spoke.Chair Roosevelt spoke.Commissioner Grisafe spoke.Michael Forrest, applicant, spoke.Commissioner Grisafe spoke.Page 2 of 5HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 5:00 PMTUESDAY, FEBRUARY 23, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHCULTURAL HERITAGE COMMISSION MINUTESCommissioner Ramos spoke.Vice Chair Irvine spoke.Commissioner McGuan spoke.Commissioner Hunter spoke.Patricia Diefenderfer, Planning Bureau Manager, spoke.Chair Roosevelt spoke.Katherine Brady provided public comment.Donna Sievers provided public comment.Bob Deardurff provided public comment.Jay Casillas provided public comment.Michael Forrest, applicant, spoke.Chair Roosevelt spoke.Vice Chair Irvine spoke.Patricia Diefenderfer, Planning Bureau Manager, spoke.Erin Weesner-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Chair Roosevelt spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner McGuan, seconded by Commissioner Ramos, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Mark Grisafe, Tasha Hunter, Kevin McGuan, Lourdes Ramos, Kathleen Irvine and Julianna RooseveltAbsent: 1 - Mary Hinds2.
